segments.text: They must have just come back from tomb sweeping because today is Tomb Sweeping Day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomb Sweeping Day ? What is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomb Sweeping Day is a traditional festival in China , on which many Chinese mourn the dead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: People go to the cemetery to pay their respects to the dead .
segments.speaker: S2
